dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1973
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary-like description of her participation in a United Farm Workers' picket in California, her arrest, and several days in jail. Discusses the work of Cesar Chaveza, Joan Baez, Daniel Ellsberg, and others. Concludes with a prayer to Pope John to aid Chavez and other rural workers throughout the United States.
